message.content:
A telephone is a device used for communication through voice conversations over a distance. 
It usually has a sleek and streamlined appearance with a cylindrical or rectangular shape and a smooth, plastic texture. 
The most common color for a telephone is black, although other colors are also available. 
A telephone can be found in many places such as homes, offices, and public areas. 
It has a keypad or buttons for dialing numbers and a speaker and microphone for transmitting the sound of the conversation. 
There is also usually a screen or display to show the information about the call. 
Overall, a telephone is an indispensable tool for communication and connecting people.
